data.title: Science And Technology Awards : Astronomy
data.meta_description: General Knowledge Lists: The list of Science And Technology Awards
data.text:
Following is the list of Science And Technology Awards:

S.No. Awards & Honours

Purpose/Objective

First Held in country/year

Name of Body/Institution/ Government

1

Gold Medal of the Royal Astronomical Society

Awarded for for achievements in geophysics, solar physics, solar-terrestrial physics, planetary sciences, astronomy, cosmology, astroparticle physics, and cosmochemistry 1824 Presented by Royal Astronomical Society 2

Kavli Prize

Awarded for Awarded for outstanding contributions in Astrophysics, Nanoscience and Neuroscience. 2008 Presented by Norwegian Academy of Science and Letters

The Kavli Foundation

Norwegian Ministry of Education and Research 3

Amateur Achievement Award of the Astronomical Society of the Pacific

It recognizes significant contributions to astronomy or amateur astronomy by those not employed in the field of astronomy in a professional capacity. 1979 Astronomical Society of the Pacific 4

Bruce Medal

Awarded for outstanding lifetime contributions to astronomy. 1898 Astronomical Society of the Pacific 5

Dannie Heineman Prize for Astrophysics

Awarded for outstanding work in astrophysics. 1980 American Astronomical Society and American Institute of Physics

6

George Van Biesbroeck Prize

Awarded for long-term achievements in the field of astronomy. 1979 The American Astronomical Society 7

James Craig Watson Medal

Awarded for contributions to astronomy. 1887 U.S. National Academy of Sciences 8

Klumpke-Roberts Award

Recognizes outstanding contributions to the public understanding and appreciation of astronomy. 1974 Astronomical Society of the Pacific 9

Robert J. Trumpler Award

Awarded to a recent recipient of the Ph.D degree whose thesis is judged particularly significant to astronomy. 1974 Astronomical Society of the Pacific
